projects.name: ISSUES.md
projects.description: Append-only lab worklog that tracks features, improvements, and maintenance activity across Marco Polo Research Lab projects.

projects.name: Photolab
projects.description: Local photo library classifier and search UI that writes high-confidence labels into EXIF, indexes metadata into SQLite, and serves a minimal browser-based search grid.

projects.name: ctx
projects.description: Terminal-first project explorer for browsing trees, reading files with embedded docs, analysing call chains, and fetching upstream docs from GitHub via one CLI.

projects.name: gix
projects.description: Git and GitHub maintenance CLI for keeping large fleets of repositories healthy by normalising folder names, aligning remotes, and automating audit/release workflows.

projects.name: gHTTP
projects.description: Go-powered static file server that mirrors python -m http.server while adding Markdown rendering, structured logging, and easy HTTPS provisioning for local work or containers.

projects.name: LoopAware
projects.description: Customer feedback platform with an embeddable widget, Google-authenticated dashboard, and APIs for collecting, triaging, and responding to product messages.

subscribe.title: Get LoopAware release updates
subscribe.copy: Drop your email to hear when LoopAware ships fresh drops, integrations, and subscriber tooling.

projects.name: Pinguin
projects.description: Production-ready notification service that exposes a gRPC API for email and SMS, persists jobs in SQLite, and retries failures with an exponential-backoff scheduler.

projects.name: Ephemeral Token Service (ETS)
projects.description: JWT + DPoP gateway that mints short-lived, browser-bound access tokens and reverse-proxies requests so front-end apps never handle provider secrets directly.

projects.name: TAuth
projects.description: Google Sign-In and session service that verifies ID tokens, issues short-lived JWT cookies, and ships a tiny auth-client.js helper for same-origin apps.

projects.name: Ledger Service
projects.description: Standalone gRPC-based virtual credits ledger that tracks grants, reservations, captures, and releases in an append-only store backed by SQL with full auditability.

projects.name: Poodle Scanner
projects.description: AI-assisted storefront auditor nicknamed “Poodle” that sniffs out PDP gaps, evaluates results against configurable rule packs, and reports issues through a CLI and authenticated dashboard.

projects.name: Sheet2Tube
projects.description: CSV and web toolkit that round-trips YouTube channel metadata between spreadsheets and your account plus a GPT-powered helper for expanding scripted placeholders.

projects.name: Gravity Notes
projects.description: Single-page Markdown notebook with an inline card grid, offline-first storage, and Google-backed sync so ideas flow without modal dialogs or context switches.

subscribe.title: Get Gravity Notes release updates
subscribe.copy: Drop your email to hear when Gravity Notes ships fresh features, AI integrations, and new plugins.

projects.name: RSVP
projects.description: Event invitation platform that generates QR-code-powered invites, tracks responses, and supports both local and production TLS setups for secure guest flows.
